content: You still haven't decided on a spot, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>? Don't stress about it. Every bit of land here is your home, and you are free to choose anywhere you like.
info: 新屋选址-莫白_主流程文本

content: Services like redecorating and relocating will be available in the future... {A灵光一现}Oh, sorry, but I'd really like the Camp to remain as a shared space for everyone, hoho!
